00053 template <typename Type>
00054 bool CTextWriteArchiveBase::ProcessInternal(const Type& value)
00055 {
00056        QByteArray string;
00057 
00058        {
00059               QTextStream stream(&string,  QIODevice::WriteOnly);
00060 
00061               stream << value;
00062        }
00063 
00064        return Process(string);
